description: Spicy-based analyzer for the TFTP protocol.
build_cmd: mkdir -p build && cd build && SPICYZ=$(command -v spicyz || echo %(package_base)s/spicy-plugin/build/bin/spicyz) cmake .. && cmake --build .
summary: Spicy-based analyzer for the TFTP protocol
readme:
Zeek::TFTP
==========

A Spicy-based TFTP analyzer.

Installation:

    zkg install spicy-tftp

This requires the [Spicy Runtime](https://github.com/zeek/spicy-runtime),
which will be installed as a dependency.
